claims.claim: The ADAMS Center will accelerate research and improve care delivery through faster data access
claims.quote: The ADAMS Center will enable the UChicago Medicine health system to accelerate research, evaluate and improve care delivery, and seek new innovative partnerships by making data available faster with self-service tools

claims.claim: The partnership will empower clinical teams to lead meaningful change and streamline operations
claims.quote: This partnership will reimagine the way data is used by UChicago Medicine. It will empower clinical teams to lead meaningful change to care delivery and to streamline research and quality improvement activity

claims.claim: Data democratization eliminates time delays from data request to fulfillment
claims.quote: the biggest one is fairly obvious: data accessibility. There are a lot of time delays from data request to fulfillment, and then it's never a one and done

claims.claim: Self-service approach enables continuous quality improvement through rapid iteration
claims.quote: Does this allow for them to think in terms of a continuous quality improvement approach, by requesting the data and getting it back rapidly, and then making some kind of iterative change in their processes and tracking the results? Spiegel: We're starting to see that happen. And that's exactly the intent.

claims.claim: Physician identified 586 patients for improved blood pressure management through self-service data access
claims.quote: There were 586 patients he identified to say that we could be doing a better job, and we should be taking an active role in that. Now he's got teams of folks reaching out to these patients and modifying their blood pressure medications over time, and hopefully improve their health outcomes.

claims.claim: AI-powered agents will alleviate pressure on staff by handling high-volume, non-urgent tasks
claims.quote: The addition of agentic, AI-powered tools is intended to alleviate pressure on staff by assisting with high-volume, non-urgent tasks and providing patients with timely responses to frequently asked questions

claims.claim: Automation of routine inquiries allows staff to focus on more complex needs requiring personalized attention
claims.quote: These tools are expected to help automate routine inquiries so that staff can focus on more complex needs that benefit from personalized attention

claims.claim: The platform boosts operational efficiency while empowering staff for meaningful patient interactions
claims.quote: By leveraging Agentforce for Health on the deeply unified Salesforce Platform, UChicago Medicine is not just boosting operational efficiency, it is empowering its staff to dedicate more time to meaningful patient interactions and elevate health outcomes
